name: Mopey Mole Mine
description:
A really basic 3D platformer I made to help me get into Unreal 4/figure out my workflow for 3D models. Has some collision flaws, and unfortunately couldn't rig my mole model as playable, but am overall proud of it!

Collect gems as you explore an underground crystal cave full of mushrooms, gems, and mining equipment. 

FOR WINDOWS ONLY. THERE IS NO MENU SO YOU MUST EXIT GAME MANUALLY!

RUNNING GAME: Go into Mopey Mole Mine folder, go to "WindowsNoEditor", go to "Mopey_Mole_Mine" Unreal Application, should be on the very bottom/last file. Game should start up after clicking. 

TO ESCAPE GAME: Click "Windows" key on keyboard, drag mouse over to game window and click exit "x".
